data.name: 'n Verlore Verstand Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the Soundtrack for 'n Verlore Verstand, containing 17 musical tracks full of mystery, adventure and the essence of dreams.

In 'n Verlore Verstand you will be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

In these realms of the unknown, you must travel through labyrinths of memories to eventually find your way to your own truth.

Track list:

01 - Die Boom
02 - Minus Temperatuur
03 - Die Lang Pad
04 - Groot Verbeelding
05 - Stad Raaisel
06 - Graniet Reen
07 - Herehuis Doolhof
08 - Koue Hekke
09 - Pad Gevaar
10 - Skemer Sonstrale
11 - 101010
12 - Groen Mure en Donker Materie
13 - Volg die Lampe
14 - Vrees die Hekke
15 - Die Langste Pad
16 - Spoke in die Sand
17 - Ontwaking

data.short_description: This is the Soundtrack for 'n Verlore Verstand, containing 17 musical tracks full of mystery, adventure and the essence of dreams. Be prepared to be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimi:
  • Sistema operativo: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processore: Dual Core
  • Memoria: 2 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • DirectX: Versione 9.0c
  • Memoria: 190 MB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Direct X compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Consigliati:
  • Sistema operativo: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processore: Quad Core
  • Memoria: 4 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • DirectX: Versione 11
  • Memoria: 1 GB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Direct X compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimi:
  • Sistema operativo: OSX Yosemite
  • Processore: Dual Core
  • Memoria: 2 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • Memoria: 190 MB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Mac OSX compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Consigliati:
  • Sistema operativo: OSX El Capitan
  • Processore: Quad Core
  • Memoria: 4 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • Memoria: 1 GB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Mac OSX compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimi:
  • Sistema operativo: Trusty Tahr (Steam OS not yet tested)
  • Processore: Dual Core
  • Memoria: 2 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • Memoria: 190 MB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Linux compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Consigliati:
  • Sistema operativo: Trusty Tahr (Steam OS not yet tested)
  • Processore: Quad Core
  • Memoria: 4 GB di RAM
  • Scheda video: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • Memoria: 1 GB di spazio disponibile
  • Scheda audio: Linux compatible
